Message: This is part 1 of a 4-part dataset series on energy, water consumption, and GHG emissions data for hotels.

The H0542 - SOFITEL MARSEILLE VIEUX PORT (Code: H0542), operated as Managed with minority in France under the SOFITEL brand, offers a LUX segment experience. It covers an area of 14740 sqm with 134 keys. In 2019, it consumed 2954176 kWh of energy. In 2020, it consumed 2313578 kWh of energy. In 2021, it consumed 3204270 kWh of energy. In 2022, it consumed 4760051 kWh of energy. For GHG emissions in 2022, it recorded 144 tons (Scope 1) and 204 tons (Scope 2). Water consumption for 2022 was 15976 kL. The number of guests in 2020 was 26509. It sold 26739 rooms in 2021. The number of guests in 2021 was 42641. It sold 34409 rooms in 2022.
